idea-plugin.name: Xcode-Dark Theme
idea-plugin.description:
This theme brings colors from the Xcode Dark theme to IntelliJ.

To install:
  • Go to Settings (Preferences) | Plugins, find the theme plugin, and install it
  • Restart the IDE
  • Go to Settings (Preferences) | Appearance & Behavior | Appearance and select Xcode-Dark in the Theme dropdown

GitHub: source code and issues
idea-plugin.change-notes:

  • Go language support

  • Fixed matching brace color

  • Updated screenshots
